translation: Calls on unlicensed servers are only available in DMs.

We highly recommend [deploying the RTCD service](https://mattermost.com/pl/calls-deployment-the-rtcd-service) to offload calls processing to a separate instance in order to maintain the performance, scalability, and reliability of your main Mattermost server.
Your installation is experiencing heavy usage from Mattermost Calls that can negatively impact system performance and responsiveness.

We highly recommend upgrading to [Enterprise](https://mattermost.com/pricing/) and [deploying the RTCD service](https://mattermost.com/pl/calls-deployment-the-rtcd-service) to offload calls processing to a separate instance in order to maintain the performance, scalability, and reliability of your main Mattermost server.

We highly recommend switching to [Mattermost Enterprise Edition](https://mattermost.com/pl/install-enterprise-install-upgrade) and [deploying the RTCD service](https://mattermost.com/pl/calls-deployment-the-rtcd-service) to offload calls processing to a separate instance in order to maintain the performance, scalability, and reliability of your main Mattermost server.
